entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Fundy (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:31 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fundy Park (Alma) 6:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: -5.3°C
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -9.9°C
Wind: NNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023
